title: Two Daughters
description:
One daughter loves the sun and one daughter loves the rain. What's a dad to do??

If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, or just tell your friends about us!
